BITD.flaw_principled_description: The cohort has an ethic or values that it won’t betray.
BITD.flaw_savage_description: The cohort is excessively violent and cruel.
BITD.flaw_unreliable_description: The cohort isn’t always available, due to other obligations, stupefaction from their vices, etc.
BITD.flaw_wild_description: The cohort is drunken, debauched, and loud-mouthed.
